welcome_message_body: Welcome to Dubai, where the vibrant cityscape meets the stunning desert landscape. Known for its luxury shopping, modern architecture, and lively culture, we invite you to explore and soak in the charm of this dynamic city. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Yakitate Japanese Boutique Cafe
restaurants.description: Yakitate Japanese Boutique Cafe is a café located in دبي.
restaurants.address: Inner streer Al Ghurair Centre, دبي

restaurants.name: Aroos Damascus Restaurant (مطعم عروس دمشق)
restaurants.description: Aroos Damascus Restaurant (مطعم عروس دمشق) is a syrian restaurant located in دبي.
restaurants.address: Al Jazeera St (at Al Muraqqabat St), دبي

restaurants.name: Al Safadi (الصفدي)
restaurants.description: Al Safadi (الصفدي) is a middle eastern restaurant located in دبي.

restaurants.name: Kebab Erbil Iraqi Restaurant (كباب إربيل العراقي)
restaurants.description: Kebab Erbil Iraqi Restaurant (كباب إربيل العراقي) is a kurdish restaurant located in دبي.

restaurants.name: Khan Murjan (خان مرجان)
restaurants.description: Khan Murjan (خان مرجان) is a middle eastern restaurant located in دبي.

terminals.name: Chelsea Twr EY Bus Station Airport
terminals.description: A small airport located in the heart of Chelsea Tower, serving as a hub for local bus routes and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dubai Airport, serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Dubai Airport, primarily serving regional and low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Dubai Airport, dedicated to Emirates and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and follow the prompts to access.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sharjah Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Sharjah Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a complimentary 2-hour access for all passengers.
